SEARCH
Module info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.student
Package info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.student

Interface AdvancedQuery

All Superinterfaces:
GroupQuery, StudentQuery
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdvancedQueryTest, StudentDB
public interface AdvancedQuery extends GroupQuery
Advanced-version interface for Student homework of Java Advanced course.
Author:
Georgiy Korneev (kgeorgiy@kgeorgiy.info)

  • Method Details

    • getMostPopularName

      String getMostPopularName(Collection<Student> students)
      Returns the first name of the student such that the most number of groups has student with that name. If there is more than one such name, the least one is returned.

    • getLeastPopularName

      String getLeastPopularName(Collection<Student> students)
      Returns the first name of the student such that the least number of groups has student with that name. If there is more than one such name, the least one is returned.

    • getFirstNames

      List<String> getFirstNames(Collection<Student> students, int[] indices)
      Returns student first names by indices.

    • getLastNames

      List<String> getLastNames(Collection<Student> students, int[] indices)
      Returns student last names by indices.

    • getGroups

      List<GroupName> getGroups(Collection<Student> students, int[] indices)
      Returns student groups by indices.

    • getFullNames

      List<String> getFullNames(Collection<Student> students, int[] indices)
      Returns full student name by indices.
